title.rendered: Women’s Sports Clothing Brand Lucky in Love Donating 20% of Select Sales to Breast Cancer Research During the Month of October

content.rendered:
In honor of Breast Cancer Awareness Month, Lucky in Love will continue its commitment to supporting women with a designated fundraising campaign.


Women's Sports Clothing
Women's Sports Clothing Brand Lucky in Love Donating 20% of Select Sales to Breast Cancer Research During the Month of October

MIAMI - October 19, 2022 - (Newswire.com)

Lucky in Love, a Miami-based women's sports clothing brand, is giving back this Breast Cancer Awareness Month. Lucky in Love's We Wear Pink campaign includes trendy styles that support the important work of the Breast Cancer Research Foundation, with 20% of each sale on select pink apparel going to the organization to support their efforts in fighting breast cancer. "At Lucky in Love, we believe that awareness is power," says Founder and Creative Director Brad Singer. "Early detection of breast cancer can catch the disease when it is most treatable." 

Lucky in Love tennis apparel and Lucky In Love golf apparel are designed to help women and girls excel in their sport while expressing their personal style. High-quality designs and innovative features are all part of this mission, as is Lucky in Love's wider commitment to women's health and wellness. As part of the We Wear Pink campaign, tennis and golf players across the U.S. will be joining Lucky in Love by wearing pink to raise awareness of breast cancer and promote access to early detection and treatment. And with nearly 288,000 new cases of breast cancer diagnosed each year, the hope is that these efforts will help make a difference in getting women closer to a cure.

Lucky in Love's We Wear Pink campaign will run through the month of October. Shoppers can visit shopluckyinlove.com to browse pink ladies' golf apparel and tennis apparel that supports the cause or view the brand's complete selection of women's and girls' tennis, golf, and pickleball attire. Please visit Lucky in Love's FAQ page for information on orders and shipping. 

About Lucky in Love

Lucky in Love is a family-owned tennis and golf apparel brand with five generations of experience in the sports apparel market. Based out of Miami, Florida, Lucky in Love offers fashion-forward designs and fresh releases every month, all to help players look and feel their best both on and off the court. For more information, follow Lucky in Love on Instagram at @shopluckyinlove and @luckyinlovekids and on TikTok at @luckyinloveshop, or visit www.shopluckyinlove.com.


Contact Information:
Isabella Valle-Riestra
Marketing Assistant at Lucky in Love
chichi@shopluckyinlove.com

Marina Vaskina
Digital Marketing and E-commerce Director at Lucky in Love
marina@shopluckyinlove.com


Press Release Service by Newswire.com

Original Source: Women's Sports Clothing Brand Lucky in Love Donating 20% of Select Sales to Breast Cancer Research During the Month of October

aioseo_head_json.twitter:title: Women’s Sports Clothing Brand Lucky in Love Donating 20% of Select Sales to Breast Cancer Research During the Month of October - Beauty Ring Magazine
aioseo_head_json.twitter:description: In honor of Breast Cancer Awareness Month, Lucky in Love will continue its commitment to supporting women with a designated fundraising campaign. Women's Sports Clothing Women's Sports Clothing Brand Lucky in Love Donating 20% of Select Sales to Breast Cancer Research During the Month of October MIAMI - October 19, 2022 - (Newswire.com) Lucky in Love, a Miami-based women's sports clothing brand, is giving back this Breast Cancer Awareness Month. Lucky in Love's We Wear Pink campaign includes trendy styles that support the important work of the Breast Cancer Research Foundation, with 20% of each sale on select pink apparel going to the organization to support their efforts in fighting breast cancer. "At Lucky in Love, we believe that awareness is power," says Founder and Creative Director Brad Singer. "Early detection of breast cancer can catch the disease when it is most treatable." Lucky in Love tennis apparel and Lucky In Love golf apparel are designed to help women and girls excel in their sport while expressing their personal style. High-quality designs and innovative features are all part of this mission, as is Lucky in Love's wider commitment to women's health and wellness. As part of the We Wear Pink campaign, tennis and golf players across the U.S. will be joining Lucky in Love by wearing pink to raise awareness of breast cancer and promote access to early detection and treatment. And with nearly 288,000 new cases of breast cancer diagnosed each year, the hope is that these efforts will help make a difference in getting women closer to a cure. Lucky in Love's We Wear Pink campaign will run through the month of October. Shoppers can visit shopluckyinlove.com to browse pink ladies' golf apparel and tennis apparel that supports the cause or view the brand's complete selection of women's and girls' tennis, golf, and pickleball attire. Please visit Lucky in Love's FAQ page for information on orders and shipping. About Lucky in Love Lucky in Love is a family-owned tennis and golf apparel brand with five generations of experience in the sports apparel market. Based out of Miami, Florida, Lucky in Love offers fashion-forward designs and fresh releases every month, all to help players look and feel their best both on and off the court. For more information, follow Lucky in Love on Instagram at @shopluckyinlove and @luckyinlovekids and on TikTok at @luckyinloveshop, or visit www.shopluckyinlove.com. Contact Information: Isabella Valle-Riestra Marketing Assistant at Lucky in Love chichi@shopluckyinlove.com Marina Vaskina Digital Marketing and E-commerce Director at Lucky in Love marina@shopluckyinlove.com Press Release Service by Newswire.com Original Source: Women's Sports Clothing Brand Lucky in Love Donating 20% of Select Sales to Breast Cancer Research During the Month of October
